title: Offense
context: [ยง571-56] Offense. A person who makes a false statement which the person does not believe to be true commits an offense whether the false statement is made under an oath required or authorized by law or under &ldquo;penalty of perjury&rdquo; as authorized by section 571-55. [L 1970, c 17, pt of ยง1; gen ch 1985]
